mapper.update: update cs_out_storages set process_user_id = #{processUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, process_user_name = #{processUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cs_apply_id = #{csApplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cs_apply_types = #{csApplyTypes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, terminal_list = #{terminalList,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, process_user_id, process_user_name, status, order_id, created_at, updated_at, cs_apply_id, cs_apply_types, quantity,terminal_list from cs_out_storages where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, process_user_id, process_user_name, status, order_id, created_at, updated_at, cs_apply_id, cs_apply_types, quantity,terminal_list from cs_out_storages

select id, process_user_id, process_user_name, status, order_id, created_at, updated_at, cs_apply_id, cs_apply_types, quantity,terminal_list from cs_out_storages where order_id in
#{item}
select id, process_user_id, process_user_name, status, order_id, created_at, updated_at, cs_apply_id, cs_apply_types, quantity,terminal_list from cs_out_storages where order_id=#{param1}

select id, process_user_id, process_user_name, status, order_id, created_at, updated_at, cs_apply_id, cs_apply_types, quantity,terminal_list from cs_out_storages where order_id = #{orderId} and status = 1
